title: GFT-GCN: Privacy-Preserving 3D Face Mesh Recognition with Spectral Diffusion
summary: 3D face recognition offers a robust biometric solution by capturing facial geometry, providing resilience to variations in illumination, pose changes, and presentation attacks. Its strong spoof resistance makes it suitable for high-security applications, but protecting stored biometric templates remains critical.
